features: 6 x Vira Safe Hand Sanitiser– Trusted UK Brand – Manufactured by a reliable UK-based brand, our Vira Safe 500ml Hand Gel is crafted to meet the highest quality standards. A large half-litre bottle ensures long-lasting use, making it ideal for homes, offices, warehouses, and businesses

Powerful 70% Alcohol Formula – Our hand sanitiser contains 70% ethanol, the scientifically proven concentration required to kill 99.9% of bacteria and germs effectively. Designed to keep you and your loved ones safe, providing professional-grade protection wherever you go.

Fast-Drying & Waterless Application – No need for soap and water! Our quick-absorbing, non-sticky formula dries instantly without leaving any residue, ensuring a convenient sanitising experience whether you're at home, work, or on the go.

Gentle on Skin – Enriched with Vitamin E & Aloe Vera – Unlike harsh sanitisers that can dry out your hands, Vira Safe Hand Gel is enriched with Vitamin E and Aloe Vera, helping to moisturise and soothe your skin while keeping it germ-free. Perfect for frequent use without irritation.

Certified & UK-Compliant – Our hand sanitiser is a fully certified product, adhering to UK safety and health standards, giving you peace of mind with every use. Rest assured, you're using a high-quality, trusted antibacterial gel that meets regulatory requirements.
description: Product Description 75% Alcohol Hand Sanitiser Studies have shown that harmful bacteria dies when in contact with products which contain no less than 70% alcohol, this is the magic formula when it comes to truly keeping your hands clean and stopping germs in their tracks. With you can rest assured our powerful formula will attack bacteria, so be sure to use at regular intervals; we’ve got you covered. Most Powerful Hand Sanitiser It contains the exact amounts of alcohol necessary to kill harmful bacteria which could lead to illness, whilst still being safe for our valued consumers. Unlike other hand-sanitisers, our special formula is non-drying and contains considerably more amounts of alcohol than your usual off the shelf brand; which is what makes it so powerful! Safe & Effective Hand Sanitiser We are serious about keeping the whole family safe from germs and nasty bacteria that can easily be transmitted whilst carrying out every-day activities. that’s why we’ve formulated the most powerful hand sanitiser gel on the market which is ensured to leave you feeling clean and protected. Vira Safe Instant Hand Sanitiser Gel Vira Safe Fast Drying Hand Sanitiser. 500ml Bottle. 70% Alcohol Gel - Kills 99.9% Bacteria & Germs, Perfect For Home, Work & Warehouses. Fast Drying. No Water Needed. Safe For Your Skin. Food Safe And Ideal For Food Production Areas. Ingredients: 70% Ethanol, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, Carbomer, Water. How To Use Vira Safe Instant Hand Sanitiser? Apply one pump (sparingly) of foam onto hands. Rub into hands for 10 – 15 seconds covering all areas to complete sanitizing and allow to dry.
